Sérgio Laranjeira

CTO @ Metacore

Hey, welcome!



I'm an Engineering Leader currently working at Metacore where we are developing games to entertain people for decades

I'm originally from Portugal and I am currently living in Berlin with my wife.

I'm passionate about engineering management, leadership and software delivery. I strive to make a meaningful impact on organizations by delivering exceptional experiences to both internal and external customers. I dedicate my time working with people, building a culture where individuals can be themselves and bringing great results to the business.

In parallel, I'm deeply committed to the cause of Diversity and Inclusion (D&I), I believe that fostering it is not just a moral imperative but also a strategic advantage, and I actively work to create inclusive workplaces, promote D&I at various events, and drive recruitment activities that promote diversity.

Sérgio Laranjeira 2024

[From Jan 2024 onwards] Chief Technology Officer The game company where players are the closest thing to a boss
[2020-2023] Senior Director of Engineering Global Food Delivery Company - Always delivering an amazing experience.
[2019-2020] [Interim] Director of Engineering N26 The Mobile Bank | Voted 'Best bank in the world 2023'
[2016-2019] Engineering Manager Biggest Europe Fashion eCommerce
[2013-2016] Tech Lead FARFETCH - The Global Destination For Modern Luxury
[2008-2013] Co-Founder and WebDeveloper Web Agency | Simplifying life, digitally
[2002-2006] Computer Graphics Engineering Graduation
